```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE,comment = NA)
```

```
This package is for teaching and learning data manipulation using the 'dplyr' package.
With this shiny app, you can learn each steps of data manipulation by clicking your mouse without coding. 
You can get resultant data(as a tibble) and the code for data manipulation. 
```

## Usage

```{r,message=FALSE}
require(tidyverse)
require(dplyrAssist)
```
```{r,echo=TRUE,eval=FALSE}
result <- mydplyr(iris)
```

```{r,fig.align='center',out.width="70%",echo=FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics("http://github.com/cardiomoon/dplyrAssist/man/figures/1.png")
```

```{r,echo=FALSE}
result<-iris %>% 
     group_by(Species) %>%
     summarise_all(mean)
attr(result,"code") <- "iris %>%\n group_by(Species) %>%\n summarise_all(mean)"
```
```{r}
result
cat(attr(result,"code"))
```
